thread.title: Target Shoppers! Buy 1 Get 1 50% Off Dresses, Including Cat & Jack Easter Dresses
thread.title_full: Target Shoppers! Buy 1 Get 1 50% Off Dresses, Including Cat & Jack Easter Dresses

author: Angela (Super Saver Sidekick)
title: Target Shoppers! Buy 1 Get 1 50% Off Dresses, Including Cat & Jack Easter Dresses

organizations.name: including cat & jack easter dresses  hippity hoppity

text:
Hippity Hoppity – Easter is on the way! If you are still looking for the perfect Easter dress for you and/or your kiddos, Target has you covered! Through March 25th, head to your local Target store or online at Target.com where you can score Buy 1 Get 1 50% off sale on Women’s Dresses , Women’s Handbags, Wallets & Jewelry and Girl’s dresses and accessories !
While shopping at my local Target store today, I spotted several cute Girls’ Dresses priced as low as $9.99 each, so just $7.50 per dress when you buy 2!
Don’t want to head in store? You can grab the same dresses pictured above online as well – just add this Cat & Jack Girls’ Multi Print Dress and this Cat & Jack Girls’ Bug Print Dress to your cart and pay only $15 total for both dresses – just $7.50 each after the discount. Opt for free in-store pickup if available near you; otherwise, shipping is free on orders of $25 or more.

If you’re a Target REDcard holder , you’ll get FREE shipping on ANY size order and an additional 5% off your purchases!
